p: Unlike the general expectation that by being agonists of the ERÎ± estrogen tamoxifen and raloxifene should have the same effects on transcription, they were reported to have widely different effects on gene expression in an osteoblast cell line ( 24). Therefore, it is possible that their effects on gene expression, including their effects on the proteasome, are different in the CNS; however, this possibility has never been tested.
